description: Returns associations between an Security Hub configuration and a batch of target accounts, organizational units, or the root. Only the Security Hub delegated administrator can invoke this operation from the home Region. A configuration can refer to a configuration policy or to a self-managed configuration.

parameters.name: ConfigurationPolicyAssociationIdentifiers
parameters.description: Specifies one or more target account IDs, organizational unit (OU) IDs, or the root ID to retrieve associations for. (dict) --- Provides details about the association between an Security Hub configuration and a target account, organizational unit, or the root. An association can exist between a target and a configuration policy, or between a target and self-managed behavior. Target (dict) --- The target account, organizational unit, or the root. AccountId (string) --- The Amazon Web Services account ID of the target account. OrganizationalUnitId (string) --- The organizational unit ID of the target organizational unit. RootId (string) --- The ID of the organization root.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationPolicyAssociations
nested_items.description: Describes associations for the target accounts, OUs, or the root.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationPolicyId
nested_items.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: TargetId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the target account, organizational unit, or the root.

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the target is an Amazon Web Services account, organizational unit, or the root.

nested_items.name: AssociationType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the association between the specified target and the configuration was directly applied by the Security Hub delegated administrator or inherited from a parent.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and ISO 8601 format, that the configuration policy association was last updated.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the association between the specified target and the configuration.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The explanation for a FAILED value for AssociationStatus.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedConfigurationPolicyAssociations
nested_items.description: An array of configuration policy associations, one for each configuration policy association identifier, that was specified in the request but couldn't be processed due to an error.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationPolicyAssociationIdentifiers
nested_items.description: Configuration policy association identifiers that were specified in a BatchGetConfigurationPolicyAssociations request but couldn't be processed due to an error.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the target account.

nested_items.name: OrganizationalUnitId
nested_items.description: The organizational unit ID of the target organizational unit.

nested_items.name: RootId
nested_items.description: The ID of the organization root.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: An HTTP status code that identifies why the configuration policy association failed.

nested_items.name: ErrorReason
nested_items.description: A string that identifies why the configuration policy association failed.
